com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table

Class ColumnModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.developmentontheedge.beans.Option
      • com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table.ColumnModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyChangeObservable, PropertyChangeListener, Serializable, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SortedColumnModel

    public class ColumnModel
extends Option
implements PropertyChangeListener
    Represents column description for all the columns in the table
    See Also:
    TabularPropertyInspector, Serialized Form

      • ColumnModel

        public ColumnModel(Object templateBean,
                   int showMode)
        Creates column model for all properties visible in the specified show mode of the template bean.
        Parameters:
        templateBean - the bean to be used to initialize columns
        showMode - should be one of SHOW_USUAL, SHOW_EXPERT, SHOW_HIDDEN, SHOW_PREFERRED

      • ColumnModel

                   int showMode)
        Creates column model for all properties visible in the specified show mode of the template bean.
        Parameters:
        templateBeanClass - the class of the bean to be used to initialize field names.
        showMode - should be one of SHOW_USUAL, SHOW_EXPERT, SHOW_HIDDEN, SHOW_PREFERRED
